Title: Death Suspects a Murder
Writer: Robby DeVillez (story), Jenn Marlis (story), Matthew Robinson (story), Matthew Robinson
Actors: Karl Andrew, Gutemberg Bobby Forestal, William Bouton, Whitney Coleman
Plot: Two detectives must work to solve a series of brutal murders at a secluded Christian college. But as the number of suspects begin to grow can they find the the killer before it's too late?
